data.title: Vaibhav Shah on LinkedIn: #outsidecomfortzone #growthmindset #adventures #culturalexperiences
data.meta_description:
Life’s Biggest decision!
 
When my parents were around 40 years old they made a life changing decision to move to United States to provide an opportunity for… | 99 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
🚀 Exciting News! 🚀 We are thrilled to welcome a fantastic group of new team members (Sai Vamsidhar Bontha, Vijay Krishnakumar & Vikas Rabadiya) to our Reliability team led by Rab Carruthers. Your expertise and enthusiasm are already evident - looking forward to working with you and supporting you in your growth journey here at bp! Together - we will continue to push the boundaries of reliability and innovation - to achieve excellence. Welcome aboard! Let's make great things happen! 💪 #WelcomeTeam #Reliability #TSI #Teamwork #bp #maintenanceandreliability #Onboarding #Hiring #bptsi

This is Vaibhav! He’s been at bp around 12 years and recently moved from the US to India to help set up our new TSI center in Pune. ✈️ “I’m a mechanical engineer by background, but the core of what I do is supporting people to achieve the best they can to overcome barriers in their work,” he says. 🚧 “What excites me with TSI is applying the positive bp culture to hard-working new team members. This all comes down to ‘who we are’: living our purpose, playing to win and caring for others.” 🥇 Want to know more? Read Vaibhav’s full story below and check out our latest TSI job opportunities. 👀 #lifeatbp

Jugaad….a term I had heard of but didn’t understand its magnitude until I arrived in India. We’ve been living in India for 4 months now, and I can't believe how much I've grown to love this country! The people have been extremely warm and welcoming, and I've learned so much from their diverse perspectives. What really stands out is their resilience and resourcefulness. They've taught me to embrace chaos and find beauty in unexpected places. I am even more grateful to be part of the new technical hub in Pune #bptsi where I’ll have a chance to work with the country’s ambitious talent. To top it off - the natural beauty is breathtaking - we’ve been enjoying the local sites - from the Dagusheth Ganesh temple to the hill station of Mahabeleswar to the beaches of Goa - we are fully soaking in everything this rich culture has to offer. #India #bptsi #jugaad #LivingInIndia #CultureShock #Foodie #NatureLover #Resilience
